#include <iostream>
using namespace std;

int main() 
{
	long long int i,x,y,a[2000];
	while(1)
	{
		cin>>x>>y;
		if(x==0 || y==0)
			break;
		long long int res=0;
		a[0]=0;
		a[1]=1;
		for(i=2;a[i]<=y;i++)
		{
			a[i]=a[i-1]+a[i-2];
			if(a[i]<=y && a[i]>=x)
				res++;
		}
		cout<<res<<endl;
	}
	return 0;
}
